message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $20,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your budget, the value of this product is quite high. Could you meet me halfway at $17,500?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $16,000? I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway again.
